segments.text: Which institute did you choose in university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I chose the Institute of Foreign Language .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many departments were there in your university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There were a number of them , such as Department of Literation , Department of Journalism and Communication , Department of Art Design , etc .
segments.speaker: S2
